formatted_address: 2, Jalan Medini Utara 4, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Dr Zainal Adwin, Urologist in Johor, Urology Clinic Gleneagles Johor, Robotic Surgeon, Kidney, Prostate, Bladder Specialist

reviews.text:
My wife recently underwent a kidney tumor removal robotic surgery on February 8th, performed by Dr. Zainal Adwin Bin Zainal Abidin at Gleneagles Medini Hospital. From start to finish, the experience was exemplary.

The accommodation provided was comfortable and modern, ensuring I felt at ease during my stay. The consultation process with Dr. Zainal was thorough and informative, leaving no question unanswered and instilling confidence in the procedure ahead.

The surgery itself was a testament to Dr. Zainal's expertise and the advanced technology available at Gleneagles Medini. His meticulous attention to detail and compassionate approach made a world of difference in my recovery.

Moreover, the hospital staff were incredibly attentive and professional, providing exceptional care and support throughout my journey. Their dedication to patient care is truly commendable.

I am immensely grateful to Dr. Zainal and the entire team at Gleneagles Medini Hospital for their outstanding service and care. I highly recommend them to anyone seeking top-notch medical treatment.

Thank you, Dr. Zainal and Gleneagles Medini Hospital, for making a challenging experience as smooth and reassuring as possible.

Dr. Zainal‚Ä¶ excellent urologist with great communication skills. He explains everything clearly. I was made to understand my problem and treatment options. The clinic & hospital is comfortable, and gives a great healing vibes and environment. I felt reassured and well-cared for throughout my visit. Highly recommend Dr. Zainal!

Meeting Dr. Zainal, the renowned consultant urologist at Gleneagles Johor, was truly a reassuring experience. From the moment I stepped into his clinic, his professionalism and compassionate demeanor immediately put me at ease. His expertise and attention to detail were evident throughout the consultation, and he patiently addressed all my questions and concerns. I highly recommend Dr. Zainal to anyone seeking expert advice and treatment for urological issues.

One of the best if not the best urologist available. Professional standards that is shown by the Dr Zainal is top notch. Few family members were having issues with prostate,  urine problem and kidney, hence the first urologist name that pop up on my mind is no other than Dr Zainal with vast experience in those area including robotic surgery. Without hesitation i direct them to seek his expert medical opinion on it. Down the road, everything when smooth and well. Thanks a million form all of us.
Dr Zainal is an attentive and careful doctor, easy to deal with and very professional in his work. Highly recommended üëçüèª
